name: Five Star Games III
overview: A seven game compilation of games originally published as stand alone titles. The final part of Beau Jolly's Five Star Games series. Caveman Capers: a single player platformer by Kevin Blake and Jason Sobell, originally released by Icon in 1985. Frak!: a single player platformer by Nick Pelling, originally released by Aardvark in 1984. Project Thesius: a single player text adventure by Robert and Mike O'Leary, originally released by Robico in 1986. Southern Belle: a single player railways simulation by Hewson Consultants, originally released by the developer in 1987. Strike Force Harrier: a single player combat flight simulator by Ron Hyde, originally released by Mirrorsoft in 1985. The Way Of The Exploding Fist: a fighting game for up to two players by Michael Simpson, originally released by Melbourne House in 1985. Thunderstruck: a single player platform adventure by Peter Scott, originally released by Audiogenic Software in 1985.
